**currency-code** for the currency in which to display pricing details for the products related to this attraction.

**Note:**
- You must have multiple currencies enabled in order to set the currency using this parameter. Please speak to your account manager if you wish to have this enabled.
- If you omit this parameter; or, if you do not have multiple currencies enabled, pricing will be returned in the default currency for your account.

panoramaCount.description: **number of panoramas** available for this attraction

ownerCountry.description: **natural-language name** of the country that the owner of this photo calls home

productTitle.description: **title** of the product that *this* photo represents

ownerAvatarURL.description: **URL** for the avatar image of the owner of this photo

productCode.description: **unique alpha-numeric identifier** of the product that this photo represents

title.description: **natural-language title** of the product that this photo represents

thumbnailURL.description: **URL** for the thumbnail image of *this* photo

ownerId.description: **unique numeric identifier** of the owner of *this* photo

editorsPick.description: **indicator**: `true` if this photo is an editor's pick

photoHiResURL.description: **URL** for the high-resolution version of *this* photo

photoMediumResURL.description: **URL** for the medium-resolution version of *this* photo

timeUploaded.description: **date** on which *this* photo was uploaded formatted according to the example

reviews.description:
Reviews of products associated with this attraction

**Note**: We perform checks on reviews - for more information, see [Key concepts - Review authenticity](#section/Key-concepts/Review-authenticity)

productTitle.description: **title** of the product that *this* photo represents

productCode.description: **unique alpha-numeric identifier** of the product that this photo represents

ownerId.description: **unique numeric identifier** for the owner of *this* review

submissionDate.description: **date** on which *this* review was submitted formatted according to the example

currencyCode.description: **currency-code** for the currency in which pricing information is displayed

duration.description: **natural-language duration** of *this* tour, formatted according to the example

supplierCode.description: **unique numeric identifer** of the supplier of *this* product expressed as a string

thumbnailURL.description: **URL** of the thumbnail image for *this* product

savingAmount.description: **magnitude of the discount** applied to *this* product represented in the currency specified in `countryCode`

savingAmountFormated.description: **magnitude of the discount** applied to *this* product represented and formatted according to the currency specified in `countryCode` (note misspelling - 'formated')

price.description: **numeric price** for *this* product respresented in the currency specified in `countryCode`

videoCount.description: ignore (Viator only) – videos are not available to partners

onSale.description: **indicator**: `true` if a discount has been applied to *this* product's price

primaryDestinationId.description: **unique numeric identifier** of the primary destination associated with *this* product

primaryDestinationName.description: **natural-language name** of the destination associated with *this* product

thumbnailHiResURL.description: **URL** for the high-resolution version of the thumbnail image for this product

attractionAdmission.description: **natural-language descrption** of the admission terms for the attraction

attractionOpenHours.description: **natural-language description** of the opening hours for *this* attraction

thumbnailURL.description: **URL** of the thumbnail image for *this* attraction

seoType.description: **indicator**: one of `'recommendation'` or `'RECOMMENDATION'` depending on the type of *this* result

keyword.description: **natural-language keyword or phrase** that describes *this* recommendation

showPhotos.description: **specifier**: `true` if photos are to be shown

primaryDestinationId.description: **unique numeric identifier** for the destination associated with *this* attraction

primaryDestinationName.description: **name** of the primary destination associated with *this* attraction

thumbnailHiResURL.description: **URL** for the high-resolution thumbnail image for *this* attraction

showReviews.description: **specifier**: `true` if reviews are to be shown

pagePrimaryLanguage.description: **language-code** for the language that *this* attraction's page is primarily expressed in

get.description:
<mark>This endpoint is **marked for deprecation**, but it will remain available to partners that started their integration prior to October 2024 to ensure backwards compatibility of existing integrations. 
Partners who got API access after October 2024 will not have access to this endpoint.
To retrieve attractions information moving forward, please use the new [/attractions/search](#operation/attractionsSearch) and [/attractions/{attraction-id}](#operation/attractionsById) endpoints</mark>


This service gets attraction-related products (for cross-selling purposes).
Attractions should be cached and refreshed weekly.

**Note**:

- <mark>This endpoint uses conventions from V1 of this API. See
[Key-concepts – V1 endpoint conventions](#section/Key-concepts/V1-endpoint-conventions) for further
information</mark>
- This endpoint is only available to <u>affiliate partners</u>

parameters.name: seoId
parameters.description: **unique numeric identifier** for the attraction to retrieve recommmendation details for

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description:
**sort order** in which to return results; one of:
- `SEO_PRODUCT_TOP_SELLERS` - Top Sellers (**Note**: What Viator gets paid impacts this sort order)
- `SEO_PRODUCT_REVIEW_AVG_RATING_A` - Traveller Rating (low->high)
- `SEO_PRODUCT_REVIEW_AVG_RATING_D` - Traveller Rating (high->low) 
- `SEO_PRODUCT_PRICE_FROM_A` - Price (low->high) 
- `SEO_PRODUCT_PRICE_FROM_D` - Price (high->low)

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description:
**currency-code** for the currency in which to display pricing details for the products associated with the attraction specified.

**Note:**
- You must have multiple currencies enabled in order to set the currency using this parameter. Please speak to your account manager if you wish to have this enabled.
- If you omit this parameter; or, if you do not have multiple currencies enabled, pricing will be returned in the default currency for your account.

primaryDestinationUrlName.description: **URL-formatted name** of the primary destination of *this* product

videoCount.description: ignore (Viator only) – videos are not available to partners

supplierCode.description: **alphanumeric identifier** for the supplier of *this* product

thumbnailHiResURL.description: **URL** for the high-resolution thumbnail image for *this* product

primaryDestinationName.description: **name** of the primary destination for *this* product

thumbnailURL.description: **URL** for the thumbnail image for *this* product

get.description:
This endpoint returns the URL to the Viator help page.
- <mark>**Note**: This endpoint uses conventions from V1 of this API. See [Key-concepts – V1 endpoint conventions](#section/Key-concepts/V1-endpoint-conventions) for further information</mark>
- **Note**: This endpoint is only available to <u>affiliate partners</u>

post.description:
Get a list of attractions associated with a given `destinationId`, along with all relevant information about them, including products mapped.

Attractions should be cached and refreshed weekly.

**Note**:

 - Pages generated using data from this endpoint are subject to a strict no-index policy. 
 You must ensure that your site is configured such that **no Viator Unique Content is indexed by any search engine**. 
 This is a requirement for site certification. For more information, see [Key concepts – Protecting unique content](#section/Key-concepts/Protecting-unique-content). 
 If you are unsure about whether you are correctly following this rule or if you would like to take advantage of our unique content, [please reach out to our support team](#section/Support).

get.description:
Get all relevant information about a specific `attractionId`, including products mapped.
    
**Note**:

 - Pages generated using data from this endpoint are subject to a strict no-index policy. 
 You must ensure that your site is configured such that **no Viator Unique Content is indexed by any search engine**. 
 This is a requirement for site certification. For more information, see [Key concepts – Protecting unique content](#section/Key-concepts/Protecting-unique-content). 
 If you are unsure about whether you are correctly following this rule or if you would like to take advantage of our unique content, [please reach out to our support team](#section/Support).

Get details of all destinations supported by the API. Destinations should be refreshed weekly (in addition to on-demand updates when a new destination is returned in the product content response). **Note**: - Returns a complete list of Viator destinations, including destination names and parent identifiers - Used to provide navigation through drill down lists or combo boxes - Use the data received from this endpoint to resolve the destination identifier(s) in the `destinations[].ref` element in the product content response

campaignValueProduct.name: campaign-value
campaignValueProduct.description:
**Affiliate partners only**: Specifies the campaign tracking identifier that will be appended to the URL returned in `productUrl` as a query parameter. Campaigns allow you to track how specific links perform, with metrics such as sessions, bookings, and commission. Reports are available via the Viator Partner Platform.

**Note**: If you wish to use a campaign value that includes non-alphanumeric characters (e.g., '+', '-', etc.), you must URL-encode these characters.

acceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguage.description: Specifies the language into which the natural-language fields in the response from this service will be translated (see [Accept-Language header](#section/Localization/Accept-Language-header-parameter) for available language codes)

accept.name: Accept
accept.description: Specifies the version of this API to access

targetLander.name: target-lander
targetLander.description:
**Affiliate partners only**: Specifies the type of landing page customers will be shown when opening the link provided in the `productUrl` field.

Ordinarily, when customers follow the link in `productUrl`, they are redirected to a sales-conversion-optimized affiliate landing page. This default behavior can be disabled by setting this parameter to `"NONE"`, which will modify the `productUrl` query string such that when opened, the customer will instead land on the standard viator.com product display page, which is **not** optimized for affiliate-link sales.

Available values:

- `"NONE"`: Causes `target_lander=NONE` to be included in the `productUrl` query string, which will **disable** redirection to an affiliate landing page when the link is followed.

Our recommendation is for you to **allow** the default behavior by **not** including this parameter, unless you have a specific technical or business requirement to do so.

exp-demo.name: exp-demo
exp-demo.description:
Specifies whether this request is a demo/test booking. Demo bookings do not send any notifications and are automatically confirmed. Also, manual-confirmation products behave as if they were instant-confirmation products. 

Set this value to **true** when:
- Making a test booking in the production environment
- Making a test booking of a manual-confirmation product in the sandbox environment and you wish to receive a booking status of `"CONFIRMED"` in the response

Set this value to **false** when:
- Making a real booking in the production environment
- Making a test booking of a manual-confirmation product in the sandbox environment and you wish to receive a booking status of `"PENDING"` in the response

optionalAcceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language
optionalAcceptLanguage.description: Specifies the language into which the natural-language fields in the response from this service will be translated (see [Accept-Language header](#section/Localization/Accept-Language-header-parameter) for available language codes)

sortOrder_REVIEW.name: sortOrder
sortOrder_REVIEW.description:
**specifier** of the order in which to return reviews

Sort order options:

  - `"REVIEW_RATING_A"`: Traveler Rating (low→high) Average
  - `"REVIEW_RATING_D"`: Traveler Rating (high→low) Average
  - `"REVIEW_RATING_SUBMISSION_DATE_D"`: Most recent review

topX.name: topX
topX.description:
**start and end rows** to return in the format {start}-{end}
- e.g. `'1-10'`, `'200-299'`

**Note**: 
- the maximum number of rows per request is 100; therefore, `'100-400'` will return the same as `'100-200'`
- if `topX` is not specified, the default is `'1-100'`

code.name: code
code.description: **unique alphanumeric identifier** of the product, corresponding to `productCode` in the response from the [product content](#section/Key-concepts/Product-content-and-availability-endpoints) endpoints

showUnavailable.name: showUnavailable
showUnavailable.description:
**specifier** as to whether or not to show 'unavailable' products:

  - `true`: return *both* available and unavailable products
  - `false`: return *only* available products (default)

campaignValueAttraction.name: campaign-value
campaignValueAttraction.description:
**Affiliate partners only**: Specifies the campaign tracking identifier that will be appended to the URL returned in `attractionUrl` as a query parameter. Campaigns allow you to track how specific links perform, with metrics such as sessions, bookings, and commission. Reports are available via the Viator Partner Platform.

**Note**: If you wish to use a campaign value that includes non-alphanumeric characters (e.g., '+', '-', etc.), you must URL-encode these characters.

campaignValueDestination.name: campaign-value
campaignValueDestination.description:
**Affiliate partners only**: Specifies the campaign tracking identifier that will be appended to the URL returned in `destinationUrl` as a query parameter. Campaigns allow you to track how specific links perform, with metrics such as sessions, bookings, and commission. Reports are available via the Viator Partner Platform.

**Note**: If you wish to use a campaign value that includes non-alphanumeric characters (e.g., '+', '-', etc.), you must URL-encode these characters.

schema.description:
Tracking identifier for this response. Please include the value of this field when making help requests.
- **Example**: `"0A871A13:DE2A_0A8712F9:01BB_5DCCC98C_260DAA:0D5B"`
Total limit of requests for this endpoint for a given window. For informational purposes only.
Remaining requests for this endpoint for a given window. For informational purposes only
The fixed window in time, in seconds, which represents when a limit is fully replenished. For informational purposes only.
The fixed window in time, in seconds, which represents when a limit is fully replenished. For informational purposes only.

productCode.description:
Code that is the unique identifier for this product.

  - Example: `"5657BRIDGECLIMB"`

language.description: Code indicating the language into which the natural-language fields in this response will be translated (if necessary)

createdAt.description:
Timestamp (UTC) indicating when this product was originally created

  - Example: `"2019-04-03T02:54:29.082753Z"`

lastUpdatedAt.description:
Timestamp (UTC) indicating the most recent occasion of this product's details being modified

  - Example: `"2020-06-11T09:16:39Z"`

TicketsPerBooking.description:
Machine-interpretable value indicating whether each traveler needs their own ticket; one of: 

  - `"ONE_PER_BOOKING"`  
  - `"ONE_PER_TRAVELER"`

ticketTypes.description:
Array of machine-interpretable values encoding the ticket type for this product; i.e., must be printed (`"PAPER"`) or can be displayed on-screen (`"MOBILE_ONLY"`); either or both of:

  - `"MOBILE_ONLY"`
  - `"PAPER"`

ticketTypeDescription.description:
Description of this ticket type
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

ticketsPerBookingDescription.description:
Description of this product's tickets-per-booking information 
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

PricingType.description:
Machine-interpretable value specifying whether the pricing for this product is calculated per individual or per group (unit); one of:  

  - `"PER_PERSON"`
  - `"UNIT"`

AgeBandType.description:
Machine-interpretable value that specifies this age band's type; one of:

  - `"ADULT"`
  - `"SENIOR"`
  - `"YOUTH"`
  - `"CHILD"`
  - `"INFANT"`
  - `"TRAVELER"`

AgeBand.description: Age range categories for this product's ticketing scheme

startAge.description: Lower limit (inclusive) of the age range defined by this age band

endAge.description: Upper limit (inclusive) of the age range defined by this age band

minTravelersPerBooking.description: Minimum number of travelers in this age band required to book the product

maxTravelersPerBooking.description: Maximum Number of travelers in this age band allowed to book the product

PricingUnitType.description:
Machine-interpretable value specifying the type of unit/group when `type` is `"UNIT"`; one of:

  - `"BIKE"`
  - `"BOAT"`
  - `"GROUP"`
  - `"PACKAGE"`
  - `"ROOM"`
  - `"AIRCRAFT"`
  - `"VEHICLE"`

ImageSourceType.description:
Machine-interpretable value indicating the source of this image; one of:

  - `"SUPPLIER_PROVIDED"`
  - `"PROFESSIONAL"`

height.description:
Height of this image in pixels

  - Example: `'480'`

width.description:
Width of this image in pixels
- Example `'720'`

url.description: URL from which this image can be retrieved.

caption.description:
Description of this photo
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

isCover.description: `true` if this photo is considered to be the cover (leading) photo for this product from this `imageSource`

variants.description: Dimension/resolution variants available for this image

LocationReference.description: Details about the location can be retrieved using the [/locations/bulk](#operation/locationsBulk) endpoint

description.description:
Description of this location

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

Redemption.description: Redemption point details for this product

redemptionType.description:
Machine-interpretable value specifying the type of redemption; one of:

  - `"NONE"` - No redemption point - this is a direct entry ticket
  - `"ATTRACTION_START_POINT"` - Tickets can be redeemed at this product's starting point
  - `"DIFFERENT_LOCATION"` - Tickets can be redeemed from a location other than the product's starting point
  - `"INDIRECT_DELIVERY"` - Tickets will be delivered post-booking by email; or, physically delivered to the customer or the customer's hotel

locations.description:
Locations for this redemption point

Details about the location can be retrieved using the [/locations/bulk](#operation/locationsBulk) endpoint

specialInstructions.description:
Special instructions pertaining to this redemption point

  - **Example**: `"Bring photo ID for entrance tickets."`

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

PickupOptionType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type of traveler pickup option; one of:

  - `"PICKUP_EVERYONE"` (the supplier will pick up all customers from their respective locations)
  - `"PICKUP_AND_MEET_AT_START_POINT"` (the supplier will pick up all customers from their respective locations; or, customers can make their own way to the start point)
  - `"MEET_EVERYONE_AT_START_POINT"` (all customers must make their own way to and meet at the start point)

**Note**:
  - This value of this field may affect whether or not some booking questions should be answered. See the section on [conditional booking questions](#section/Booking-concepts/Booking-questions) for more information.

pickupType.description:
Type of pickup location; one of: 

  - `"AIRPORT"` – the item is an airport
  - `"HOTEL"` – the item is a hotel
  - `"PORT"` – the item is a sea port
  - `"LOCATION"` – the item is a specific address added by the supplier
  - `"OTHER"` – the item is a pseduo-location; one of: 
    + `"MEET_AT_DEPARTURE_POINT"`, or 
    + `"CONTACT_SUPPLIER_LATER"`

**Note**: The pickup type becomes relevent when providing answers to [booking questions](#section/Booking-concepts/Booking-questions) when making a booking.

TravelerPickup.description: Traveler pickup details for this product

allowCustomTravelerPickup.description:
Specifies whether travelers can choose a custom pickup or meeting location for this product

  - **Note**: If 'false', answer to `"PICKUP_POINT"` booking question in request to [/bookings/book](#operation/bookingsBook), `unit` must be `"LOCATION_REFERENCE"` and not `"FREETEXT"`

minutesBeforeDepartureTimeForPickup.description: How long prior to the product departure time will traveler-pickup occur (in minutes)

additionalInfo.description:
Description of additional information regarding traveler pickup

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

category.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the category of this product feature; one of:

  - `"EQUIPMENT"` 
  - `"FOOD_AND_DRINK"`
  - `"TRANSPORT_AMENITIES"`
  - `"FEES_AND_TAXES"`
  - `"SOUVENIRS"`
  - `"OTHER"`


  For information on mapping, see: [Appendices – Inclusions and exclusions](#section/Appendices/Inclusions-and-exclusions)

categoryDescription.description:
Description of this product feature
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

type.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type/category of this product feature; one of:

  - `"FUEL_SURCHARGE"`
  - `"LANDING_AND_FACILITY_FEES"`
  - `"AIRPORT_AND_DEPARTURE_TAX"`
  - `"GST"`
  - `"GRATUITIES"`
  - `"PARKING_FEES"`
  - `"ALL_FEES_AND_TAXES"`
  - `"USE_OF_BICYCLE"`
  - `"USE_OF_SCUBA_EQUIPMENT"`
  - `"USE_OF_SNORKELING_EQUIPMENT"`
  - `"USE_OF_TRIKKE"`
  - `"USE_OF_SEGWAY"`
  - `"USE_OF_OTHER_EQUIPMENT"`
  - `"USE_OF_COOKING_UTENSILS"`
  - `"ALL_INGREDIENTS"`
  - `"BREAKFAST"`
  - `"LUNCH"`
  - `"DINNER"`
  - `"SNACKS"`
  - `"BOTTLED_WATER"`
  - `"COFFEE_AND_TEA"`
  - `"SODA_POP"`
  - `"ALCOHOLIC_BEVERAGES"`
  - `"REFRESHMENTS"`
  - `"AIR_CONDITIONED_VEHICLE"`
  - `"RESTROOM_ON_BOARD"`
  - `"PRIVATE_TRANSPORTATION"`
  - `"WIFI_ONBOARD"`
  - `"CERTIFICATE"`
  - `"RECIPE_BOOKLET"`
  - `"OTHER"`


  For information on mapping, see: [Appendices – Inclusions and exclusions](#section/Appendices/Inclusions-and-exclusions)

typeDescription.description:
Description of this product feature type 
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

otherDescription.description:
Description of this product feature when `type` is `"OTHER"`
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

quantity.description:
Quantity of this type of inclusion or exclusion in the case that the product is a multi-day tour or activity. For example, a three-day tour might include three inclusions of type `"LUNCH"` - one for each day of the tour.

**Note**: This field will be only be present when `quantity` > 1

description.description:
Description of the item
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

AdditionalInfo.description: An additional information fact to communicate to travelers regarding this product

type.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type/category of additional information fact; one of (but not limited to):

  - `"OTHER"`
  - `"WHEELCHAIR_ACCESSIBLE"`
  - `"NOT_WHEELCHAIR_ACCESSIBLE"`
  - `"STROLLER_ACCESSIBLE"`
  - `"PETS_WELCOME"`
  - `"PUBLIC_TRANSPORTATION_NEARBY"`
  - `"INFANTS_MUST_SIT_ON_LAPS"`
  - `"INFANT_SEATS_AVAILABLE"`
  - `"TRANSPORTATION_WHEELCHAIR_ACCESSIBLE"`
  - `"SURFACES_WHEELCHAIR_ACCESSIBLE"`
  - `"NO_BACK_PROBLEMS"`
  - `"NO_PREGNANT"`
  - `"NO_HEART_PROBLEMS"`
  - `"HEALTH_OTHER"`
  - `"PHYSICAL_EASY"`
  - `"PHYSICAL_MEDIUM"`
  - `"PHYSICAL_HARD"`

description.description:
Description of this additional information fact
- **Example**: "Operates in all weather conditions (with the exception of extreme weather conditions such as an electrical storm)"
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

CancellationConditionType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type of cancellation policy for this product; one of:

  - `STANDARD` - Products in this category are cancellable up to 24 hours before the travel date (local supplier time) for a full refund. However, a 100% cancellation penalty applies for cancellations submitted less than 24 hours before the start time. Most products (about 85%) fall into this category.
  - `ALL_SALES_FINAL` - Products in this category cannot be cancelled or amended without incurring a 100% penalty; i.e., the refund amount will be zero. Around 10% of products fall into this category.
  - `CUSTOM` - The refund amount for products in this category varies depending on how long before its start time the product is cancelled. Many products on a custom policy are multi-day tours, which require more sophisticated planning on the supplier’s end. Only a small number of products (around 5%) fall into this category.

For more information, see our in-depth guide about cancellation policies and how to handle cancellations: [All you need to know about cancellation policies](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/merchant/cancellation-policies?source=specs).

CancellationCondition.description: Structured description of fees pertaining to cancellations during various time windows.

dayRangeMin.description: Number of days prior to the product start time (relative to the time zone in which the product operates) that this policy window ends.

dayRangeMax.description: Number of days prior to the tour start time (relative to the time zone in which the product operates) that this policy window begins. When this field is absent, it signifies negative infinity; i.e., the beginning of time.

percentageRefundable.description: Percentage of total price refundable if a booking for this product is cancelled within the period defined by `dayRangeMin` and `dayRangeMax`.

startTimestamp.description:
Timestamp (UTC) indicating the **beginning** of the period during which this cancellation policy applies; e.g. `2019-09-17T03:20:45.737043Z`.
- Note: this element will appear in the response from [/bookings/book](#operation/bookingsBook) but will **not** be present in responses from /products/* endpoints.

endTimestamp.description:
Timestamp (UTC) indicating the **end** of the period during which this cancellation policy applies; e.g. `2019-09-17T03:20:45.737043Z`.
- Note: this element will appear in the response from /bookings/book but will **not** be present in responses from /products/* endpoints.

CancellationPolicy.description: Cancellation policy details for this product.

cancelIfBadWeather.description: **True** if the supplier of this product may cancel on account of weather conditions.

cancelIfInsufficientTravelers.description: **True** if the supplier of this product can cancel due to too few participants.

refundEligibility.description: Cancellation policy definitions for this product.

BookingCutoffType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type of booking cutoff; one of:

  - `"OPENING_TIME"`
  - `"CLOSING_TIME"`
  - `"START_TIME"`
  - `"FIXED_TIME"`

ConfirmationType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding when bookings for this product will be confirmed; one of: 

  - `"INSTANT"` (instantly) 
  - `"MANUAL"` (requires manual action prior to confirmation)
  - `"INSTANT_THEN_MANUAL"` (combination – subject to cutoff time)

BookingConfirmationSettings.description:
How this product's bookings are confirmed

For more information, see [Booking concepts – Booking cutoff
times](#section/Booking-concepts/Booking-cutoff-times)

bookingCutoffInMinutes.description: Period in minutes before the start time, opening time, closing time, or a fixed time (respectively, depending on the value of `bookingCutoffType`) that this product can be booked

manualConfirmationPeriod.description: When the `confirmationType` is `"INSTANT_THEN_MANUAL"`, the value of this field indicates the length of the time period (in minutes) leading up to the product's start time within which bookings for this product require manual confirmation by the supplier before the booking is confirmed. When a booking is made prior to this time (in the time zone in which the product operates), the product behaves as an instant confirmation product.

bookingCutoffFixedTime.description:
Time of day before which this product can be booked (ISO-8601 time stamp, no time zone)

  - Example: `'14:30:00.1234'`

BookingRequirements.description: Passenger type and number requirements for booking

minTravelersPerBooking.description: Minimum number of travelers required to book this product

maxTravelersPerBooking.description: Maximum number of travelers required to book this product

requiresAdultForBooking.description: **True** if at least one passenger from the `"ADULT"` or `"SENIOR"` age band type must be included to book this product

LanguageGuide.description:
Specifies which language and what type of language guide to include if language guides are available for this product. 

**Note:** This element must be included in order to book products that offer language guides.

type.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the type of language guide; one of:

Destination.description: Reference details about a destination associated with this product

ref.description:
Unique numeric identifier for this destination
- **Note**: Full details about the destination associated with this reference can be found in the response from the [/destinations](#operation/destinations) endpoint.

primary.description: **True** if this is the primary destination associated with this product

Itinerary.description:
Details about the places this product visits

See: [Key concepts – Itineraries](#section/Key-concepts/Itineraries) for more information

skipTheLine.description: **True** if a ticket for this product allows the customer to 'skip the line'

privateTour.description: **True** if this product is a private tour; i.e., customers other than those in this booking will **not** be present

maxTravelersInSharedTour.description: Maximum number of travelers that will be present if this product is not a private tour

unstructuredDescription.description:
Natural language description of this product's itinerary in the case that `itineraryType` is `"UNSTRUCTURED"`. This field can take any value and is therefore not machine interpretable. 

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

ItineraryDuration.description:
Duration information for this itinerary

**Note**: Depending on whether this itinerary has a fixed or variable duration, this object will include either the `fixedValueInMinutes` element alone; or, both the `fromMinutes` and `toMinutes` elements, respectively.

fixedDurationInMinutes.description: Duration of this itinerary (in minutes) in the case that it takes a fixed amount of time

variableDurationFromMinutes.description: Lower limit of the duration of this itinerary (in minutes) in the case that this product's duration varies

variableDurationToMinutes.description: Upper limit of the duration of this itinerary (in minutes) in the case that this product's duration varies

ItineraryPoi.description: Details about this Point Of Interest (POI)

attractionId.description:
Unique identifier in the Viator taxonomy of this point of interest if it is regarded as an attraction
- **Note:** Use the `destinations[].ref` values in this response as the `destId` request parameter when using the V1 [/v1/taxonomy/attractions](#tag/V1-endpoints/paths/~1v1~1taxonomy~1attractions/post) endpoint get a list of the relevant attraction.

AdmissionInclusionType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding whether the admission fee for this place is included; one of:

  - `"YES"`
  - `"NO"`
  - `"NOT_APPLICABLE"`

passByWithoutStopping.description: **True** if this product only 'passes by' this point of interest (i.e., travelers remain in the vehicle)

description.description:
Description of this itinerary item

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter"

allOf.description: Itinerary information where this product is a standard tour

itineraryItems.description: Places that this tour visits or passes through

ActivitiesItineraryItem.description: Location and description of this activity item

description.description:
Description of this activity item

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

ActivityFoodMenu.description: Food menu details for this activity

course.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the meal course category for this menu item; one of: 

  - `"STARTER"`

dishName.description:
Name of this dish

dishDescription.description:

allOf.description: Itinerary information where this product is an activity

Title of this day of the tour

foodAndDrinks.description: Food and drinks available for this day of this tour

unstructuredItinerary.description:
Description of this product's itinerary

pointOfInterestLocations.description: Places of interest relevant to this itinerary

ItineraryType.description:
Machine-interpretable value specifying the type of itinerary available for this product; one of:

  - `"STANDARD"`
  - `"ACTIVITY"`
  - `"MULTI_DAY_TOUR"`
  - `"HOP_ON_HOP_OFF"`

ProductOption.description: Detail about a single product option for this product

productOptionCode.description:
Identification code for this product option 

  - **Example**: `"BCLM"`


For more information see: [Key concepts: Product options](#section/Key-concepts/Product-options)

description.description:
Description of this product option

**Note**: 
- Please note that whether this field contains the phrase "pickup included" has implications regarding which booking questions need to be answered when booking this product option. See [Booking concepts – Conditional booking questions](#section/Booking-concepts/Booking-questions) for more information.
- This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

title.description:
Title of this product option

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

languageGuides.description: Language guides available for this product option

TranslationDetails.description: Information about whether the text in this response was machine-translated

containsMachineTranslatedText.description: Indicates whether this product description utilizes text in any of its natural language fields that was automatically machine-translated with no human oversight

translationSource.description:
One of:
- `"MACHINE"` – The text provided by the supplier is in a **different language** and has been **automatically translated** by our systems with no human oversight.
- `"ORIGINAL"` – The text provided by the supplier is in the language that is standard for their locale.
- `"MANUAL"` – The text provided by the supplier was in a different language to the standard for their locale; however, whether this is a direct translation of the original text (performed either by machine or human) or whether it is a customised description for speakers of this language is not known.

translationAttribution.description:
Value specifying the machine-translation service vendor. At present, translation attribution is not a requirement.

  - **Example**: `"GOOGLE"`

name.description: Name of the supplier of this product

reference.description: Unique reference code for this supplier

ProductReviewCount.description: Breakdown of number of reviews for each rating of this product

rating.description: Rating given in the review for this product

count.description: How many reviews of this product have this rating

provider.description:
Source of the review; one of:
  - `"VIATOR"`
  - `"TRIPADVISOR"`

reviewCounts.description: Breakdown of ratings and counts for reviews from this source for this product

totalCount.description: Total number of reviews for all ratings of this product

averageRating.description:
Average rating across all reviews from this source for this product

This average is equal to the sum of the product of each rating and its count divided by the sum of the counts.

ProductReviews.description:
Summary of reviews and ratings for this product

**Note**: 

  - Review data is updated daily; i.e., all reviews received on a day will be added and averages re-calculated in a single event.
  - Viator performs checks on reviews - for more information, see [Key concepts - Review authenticity](#section/Key-concepts/Review-authenticity)

sources.description: Breakdown of ratings, counts and the sources of the reviews of this product

reviewCountTotals.description: Combined total number of reviews per rating across all sources for this product

totalReviews.description: Total number of reviews from all sources for this product

combinedAverageRating.description: Average rating for all reviews from all sources for this product

ViatorUniqueContent.description:
Product details unique to Viator.com

**Note**: 
  - Access to this information is only available if it is enabled for your account. Please speak to your account manager if you would like to take advantage of our unique content.
  - You must ensure that your site is configured such that **no Viator Unique Content is indexed by any search engine**. This is a requirement for site certification. For more information, see [Key concepts – Protecting unique content](#section/Key-concepts/Protecting-unique-content)

title.description:
Viator-improved title of this product

This replaces the supplier-provided-title (given in the `title` element). Improved by Viator, this is a more sales-worthy title for this product.

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter.

shortDescription.description:
Viator-improved description of this product

This replaces the supplier-provided-description (given in the `description` element) and is used in the 'Overview' section of the product display page on Viator.com.

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter.

longDescription.description:
Viator-improved natural-language description of this product's itinerary

This text is used in the 'What To Expect' section of the product display page on Viator.com as a preamble to the structured itinerary.

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter.

insiderTips.description:
Viator's 'insider-tips' for this product

This text is used in the 'Overview – Why Travelers Chose This Tour' section of the product display page on Viator.com.

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter.

highlights.description:
Viator's 'highlights' for this product

These text items are used to provide additional bullet-point highlights as part of the 'Overview' section of the product display page on Viator.com.

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter.

title.description:
Title of this product 

 - **Example**: `"Sydney BridgeClimb"`

 - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

timeZone.description:
Code for the time zone in which this product operates (IANA TZ database name format)

  - **Example**: `'Australia/Sydney'`

description.description:
Description of this product

  - **Example**: "Climb the Sydney Harbour Bridge with an expert guide for the ultimate Sydney experience..."

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

inclusions.description:
Features that are **included** with this product package

  - **Note**: The same inclusion item may appear multiple times in this array. For example, `'Lunch'`. For a 7-day multi-day tour, 'Lunch' appearing seven times indicates that lunch is included on each of the seven days of the tour. This can be displayed as "Lunch (7)"

exclusions.description: Features that are **not included** with this product package

additionalInfo.description:
Facts necessary to communicate to travelers regarding this product.
 
 **Note**: Items included only if they apply, if they do not apply they will not be included in the response.

languageGuides.description: Language guides available for this product across all product option codes

bookingQuestions.description: Array of machine-interpretable values specifying the facts that the traveler must provide when booking this product; further details can be retrieved via the [/products/booking-questions](#operation/productsBookingQuestions) endpoint

tags.description:
Array of numeric tag identifiers indicating the product categories into which this product falls
To retrieve details about which tags these identifiers refer to, please use the [/products/tags](#operation/productsTags) endpoint.

destinations.description: Destinations – i.e., cities, states, countries and regions – in which this product can be considered to operate

productOptions.description:
Product options (tour grades) available for this product

For more information see: [Key concepts: Product options](#section/Key-concepts/Product-options)

productUrl.description:
URL for this product on the viator.com site, where the customer will complete their booking.

This URL includes all the necessary information for viator to correctly attribute and pay commission for the sale to the referring partner.

If `campaign-value` is included in the request, this URL will also include the campaign tracking value that you set.

For more information, see our guide to [Affiliate Attribution](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/affiliate/attribution/) on the Viator Partner Resource Center.

**Note**: 

- This element is only returned for affiliate partners. 
- **<mark>You must use the full URL and not modify it in any way – any changes could result in failure to attribute the sale to you, which means you <u>will not</u> be paid a commission for this sale.</mark>**

**Example format**: https://www.viator.com/tours/Sydney/Sydney-and-Bondi-Hop-on-Hop-off-Tour/d357-5010SYDNEY?mcid=42383&pid=P00045135&medium=api&version=2.0&campaign=example

ProductStatus.description:
Machine-interpretable value indicating this product's current availablility; one of:

  - `"ACTIVE"` - product is available for sale
  - `"INACTIVE"` - product is not available for sale (remainder of object will be empty)

products.description: Products that fall within the search/filter criteria

nextCursor.description:
Pagination cursor pointing to the next page of results
- Example: `"MTU3NDA0NDczOQ=="`

trackingId.description:
Tracking identifier for this error response. 

**Example**: `"0A871A13:DE2A_0A8712F9:01BB_5DCCC98C_260DAA:0D5B"`

productCodes.description: List of product codes for which to retrieve full product details

parentTagIds.description: Unique identifiers for parent tags of this tag

allNamesByLocale.description: Dictionary of language codes to the description of this tag in that language

TagsResponse.description:
Numeric product category/subcategory tag identifiers for this product

To retrieve details about which tags these identifiers refer to, please use the [/products/tags](#operation/productsTags) endpoint.

BookingQuestionFormatType.description:
Machine-interpretable value encoding the required unit type for the answer to the booking question; one of:

  - `"STRING"`
  - `"NUMBER_AND_UNIT"`
  - `"DATE"`
  - `"TIME"`
  - `"LOCATION_REF_OR_FREE_TEXT"`

BookingQuestionGrouping.description:
Machine-interpretable value specifying whether the booking question must be answered individually for each traveler or once per group of travelers in each booking; one of:

  - `"PER_TRAVELER"`
  - `"PER_BOOKING"`

legacyBookingQuestionId.description: Unique identifier of this booking question <mark>for use with legacy (V1) booking endpoint only</mark>

id.description:
Machine-interpretable value that identifies this booking question; one of:
Possible values:

  - `"DATE_OF_BIRTH"`
  - `"HEIGHT"`
  - `"PASSPORT_EXPIRY"`
  - `"PASSPORT_NATIONALITY"`
  - `"PASSPORT_PASSPORT_NO"`
  - `"PICKUP_POINT"`
  - `"TRANSFER_AIR_ARRIVAL_AIRLINE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_AIR_ARRIVAL_FLIGHT_NO"`
  - `"TRANSFER_AIR_DEPARTURE_AIRLINE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_AIR_DEPARTURE_FLIGHT_NO"`
  - `"TRANSFER_ARRIVAL_DROP_OFF"`
  - `"TRANSFER_ARRIVAL_TIME"`
  - `"TRANSFER_DEPARTURE_DATE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_DEPARTURE_PICKUP"`
  - `"TRANSFER_DEPARTURE_TIME"`
  - `"TRANSFER_PORT_ARRIVAL_TIME"`
  - `"TRANSFER_PORT_CRUISE_SHIP"`
  - `"TRANSFER_PORT_DEPARTURE_TIME"`
  - `"TRANSFER_RAIL_ARRIVAL_LINE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_RAIL_ARRIVAL_STATION"`
  - `"TRANSFER_RAIL_DEPARTURE_LINE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_RAIL_DEPARTURE_STATION"`
  - `"WEIGHT"`
  - `"FULL_NAMES_FIRST"`
  - `"FULL_NAMES_LAST"`
  - `"DISEMBARKATION_TIME"`
  - `"SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS"`
  - `"AGEBAND"`
  - `"TRANSFER_ARRIVAL_MODE"`
  - `"TRANSFER_DEPARTURE_MODE"`

label.description:
Title of this booking question 

  - **Example**: "Traveler height in feet or centimeters"

  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

units.description: Units that may be used when answering this booking question

allowedAnswers.description: List of allowed answers for this booking question if the answer represents a selection from a set of specific answers

required.description:
Key string indicating whether an answer must be provided to this question if it is included in the product's description

One of: 

  - `MANDATORY` - it is always mandatory to provide an answer to this question
  - `OPTIONAL` - it is optional to provide an answer to this question
  - `CONDITIONAL` - it is only mandatory to answer this question if it is made so by the presence of a related booking question. See [Key concepts - Booking questions](#section/Booking-concepts/Booking-questions) for more information.

maxLength.description: Maximum allowable input length for the answer, measured in characters (UTF-8)

BookingQuestionsResponse.description: Information about this product's booking questions

ProductSearchFlag.description:
One of:

  - `"NEW_ON_VIATOR"` – products that have been added to Viator's catalogue within the past 270 days
  - `"SKIP_THE_LINE"` – products that allow participants to attend a location without having to obtain a separate ticket on the occasion itself (`itinerary.skipTheLine` is `true`)
  - `"PRIVATE_TOUR"` – products where only the travelers who have booked the product will be present (`itinerary.privateTour` is `true`)
  - `"SPECIAL_OFFER"` – products that have a pricing discount available (i.e., `summary.fromPriceBeforeDiscount` will be present in the response from [/availability/schedules/{product-code}](#operation/availabilitySchedules))
  - `"LIKELY_TO_SELL_OUT"` - popular products that routinely sell out (this is equivalent to filtering by tag `20757`).

SearchRatingInfo.description: Only return products that have a rating that is in the range defined here

from.description: Only return products with a rating greater than this value

to.description: Only return products with a rating less than this value

SearchDurationInfo.description: Only return products that have a duration that is in the range defined here

from.description: Match products with durations longer than this value

to.description: Match products with durations shorter than this value

ProductSearchFiltering.description: Only return products that match **all** the criteria provided here.

destination.description:
Only return products that include the destination indicated by this numeric destination reference (as listed in the `destinations` array in the product content response), regardless of whether it is the product's primary destination.

See [Resolving references](#section/Workflows/Resolving-references) for more information about destinations.

**Note**: Specifying a 'country' destination will include all 'city' destinations within that country.

tags.description:
Only return products that include **all** tag identifiers provided here. Products with child tags of any parent tags specified here will also be returned.

See the [Resolving references](#section/Workflows/Resolving-references) section and this article: [Viator tags, explained](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/tags?source=specs) for more information about tags.

flags.description:
Only return products that include **all** of the given attributes, which may include any of:

  - `"NEW_ON_VIATOR"` - products that have been added to Viator's catalogue within the past 270 days
  - `"FREE_CANCELLATION"` – products that have a cancellation policy that allows for free cancellation (i.e., excludes products for which `cancellationPolicy.type` is `"ALL_SALES_FINAL"` in the product content response)
  - `"SKIP_THE_LINE"` – products that allow participants to attend a location without having to obtain a separate ticket on the occasion itself (`itinerary.skipTheLine` is `true`)
  - `"PRIVATE_TOUR"` – products where only the travelers who have booked the product will be present (`itinerary.privateTour` is `true`)
  - `"SPECIAL_OFFER"` – products that have a pricing discount available (i.e., `summary.fromPriceBeforeDiscount` will be present in the response from [/availability/schedules/{product-code}](#operation/availabilitySchedules))
  - `"LIKELY_TO_SELL_OUT"` - popular products that routinely sell out (this is equivalent to filtering by tag `20757`).

confirmationType.description:
Only return products with this confirmation type; one of:
  
  - `"INSTANT"` (instant confirmation)

includeAutomaticTranslations.description: Specifies whether results with machine translated content should be included or not

attractionId.description: Only return products that are associated with the **attraction** referenced by this unique numeric identifier, which is the value of the `seoId` property in the response from the [/attractions/search](#operation/attractionsSearch) endpoint.

lowestPrice.description: Only return products that have a `fromPrice` that is higher than or equal to this price. If a date range is specified using `startDate` and `endDate`, pricing for the product only during this period will be considered.

highestPrice.description: Only return products that have a `fromPrice` that is lower than or equal to this price. If a date range is specified using `startDate` and `endDate`, pricing for the product only during this period will be considered.

startDate.description:
Only return products that are available during a period of time starting from this date.

- **Format**: ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) in the time-zone of supplier
- **Default**: date on which the request is made in the time-zone of supplier
- **Note**: `startDate` cannot be in the past

endDate.description:
Only return products that are available during a period of time ending on this date. 

- **Format**: ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) in time-zone of supplier
- **Default**: one year in advance of the date on which the request is made in the time-zone of supplier
- **Note**:
  - `endDate` cannot be in the past and is limited to one year from the date on which the request is made.  
  - Multi-day tours that conclude after this date will still appear in the results, so long as the tour commences prior to this date, even if they conclude on a date that is further into the future than `endDate`. If you wish to exclude such products from the search results, the following options are available:
    1. Exclude all multi-day tours from the search results by filtering out any items that contain `"itineraryType": "MULTI_DAY_TOUR"`
    2. Implement your own logic to calculate whether a product concludes after the `endDate` specified in the request by requesting full product details for the multi-day tour using [/products/{product-code}](#operation/products), determining the duration of the tour in days by the length of the `itinerary.days[]` array, and filtering this product from the search results in the event that (`startDate` + duration) occurs after `endDate`.

ProductSearchSorting.description: How the search results will be sorted

sort.description:
Method by which product search results will be sorted; one of:
  
  - `"DEFAULT"`: the default sort, where 'featured' products appear first (**Note**: What Viator gets paid impacts this sort order). Custom ordering is not supported (therefore, the `order` field should be omitted when this sort order is chosen)
  - `"PRICE"`: products are sorted by `fromPrice`, with ordering based on the value of the `order` field (default is `"ASCENDING"` if the `order` field is omitted)
  - `"TRAVELER_RATING"`: Sort products by their average rating
    - **Note**: This method can only be used with an `order` of `"DESCENDING"`
  - `"ITINERARY_DURATION"` - Sort by how long the tour or activity lasts (in minutes)
  - `"DATE_ADDED"` - Sort according to when the product was added to the viator catalogue

order.description:
Ordering of product search results when `sort` is `"PRICE"`

One of: 
  - `"ASCENDING"`
  - `"DESCENDING"`

ProductSearchPagination.description: Pagination details specifying which search results to return based on start position and item count

start.description: Position of first filtered and ordered search result to be included in the response (1-based)

count.description: Number of filtered and ordered search results to be returned in the response

currency.description:
Currency code for all prices provided in the request; and, the currency in which all pricing will be denominated in the response.

One of: 

 - `"AUD"`
 - `"BRL"`
 - `"CAD"`
 - `"CHF"`
 - `"DKK"`
 - `"EUR"`
 - `"GBP"`
 - `"HKD"`
 - `"INR"`
 - `"JPY"`
 - `"NOK"`
 - `"NZD"`
 - `"SEK"`
 - `"SGD"`
 - `"TWD"`
 - `"USD"`
 - `"ZAR"`

 
**Note**: The currency you display to your users may not be the currency they see when they click through to the viator.com site. Instead, they will see the default currency for the locale from which they are accessing the site.

AvailabilityScheduleSummary.description:
Information about the lowest price available for this product

**Note**: The pricing information given here is based on the recommended retail price (RRP). While affiliate partners must sell at this price, merchant partners set their own prices according to their own margins and booking fees; therefore, merchant partners must calculate their own from-price for display, rather than using these values, unless they have elected to sell at the RRP.

fromPrice.description:
Lowest per-person retail price for this product, calculated according to the price for a group of at least two standard participants (or, the smallest bookable group if more than two participants are required) for a period not exceeding 384 days into the future.
This value can be used to advertise a 'from'-price; e.g., "From $99 per person"

fromPriceBeforeDiscount.description: If the product is presently discounted, this field shows what the value of `fromPrice` would be if no discount had been applied; otherwise, it will be absent.

AvailabilityScheduleExtraChargesSummary.description: Information about the lowest price with extra charges available for this product

fromPrice.description:
`fromPrice` value including `extraCharges` value to be paid in destination by the traveler based on their age, day of the week, time of the year or any other criteria defined by the supplier.
This value will only be returned if the product has Extra Charges in at least one `bookableItem`.

fromPriceBeforeDiscount.description: If the product is presently discounted, this field shows what the value of `fromPrice` would be if no discount had been applied; otherwise, it will be absent.

extraCharges.description: The highest amount that a traveler could be asked to pay in-destination based on their age, day of the week, time of the year or any other criteria defined by the supplier for the `bookableItem` used to calculate the starting price.

ProductSearchPricing.description:
High-level summary of product prices
  
  - **Note**: This price may not be available during the date range specified in the `filtering` section of the request

fromPriceBeforeDiscount.description: If the product is presently discounted, this field shows what the value of `fromPrice` would be if no discount had been applied; otherwise, it will be equal to `fromPrice`.

currency.description: Currency code for the currency in which the prices in `summary` are denominated

partnerNetFromPrice.description:
Lowest per-person price for this product expressed as the amount (excluding the booking fee)that merchant partners using the markup/booking-fee pricing scheme would be invoiced. 

This value is calculated according to the price for a group of at least two standard participants (or, the smallest bookable group if more than two participants are required) for a period not exceeding 384 days into the future.

**Note**: This property is only relevant to you and will only be returned if you are a markup merchant partner (i.e., you are a merchant and are not using the commission-based pricing model).

productCode.description:
Code that is the unique identifier for this product.

- Example: `"5657BRIDGECLIMB"`

title.description:
Natural-language title of this product

  - **Example**: `"Sydney BridgeClimb"`
  - **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

description.description:
Description of this product

- **Example**: "Climb the Sydney Harbour Bridge with an expert guide for the ultimate Sydney experience..."
- **Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

productUrl.description:
URL for this product on the viator.com site, where the customer will complete their booking.

This URL includes all the necessary information for viator to correctly attribute and pay commission for the sale to the referring partner.

If `campaign-value` is included in the request, this URL will also include the campaign tracking value that you set.

For more information, see our guide to [Affiliate Attribution](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/affiliate/attribution/) on the Viator Partner Resource Center.

**Note**: 

- This element is only returned for affiliate partners. 
- **<mark>You must use the full URL and not modify it in any way – any changes could result in failure to attribute the sale to you, which means you <u>will not</u> be paid a commission for this sale.</mark>**

**Example format**: https://www.viator.com/tours/Sydney/Sydney-and-Bondi-Hop-on-Hop-off-Tour/d357-5010SYDNEY?mcid=42383&pid=P00045135&medium=api&version=2.0&campaign=example

destinations.description:
Destinations in which this product operates.

- **Note**: At present, only the primary destination ID is returned; i.e., the item in the `destinations` array of the product content response for which `primary` is `true`. Therefore, `primary` will always be `true` in this response. Furthermore, the destination given here may differ from the destination specified in the request.

tags.description:
Array of numeric tag identifiers indicating the product categories into which this product falls 

To retrieve details about which tags these identifiers refer to, please use the [/products/tags](#operation/productsTags) endpoint.

See the [Resolving references](#section/Workflows/Resolving-references) section and this article: [Viator tags, explained](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/tags?source=specs) for more information about tags.

flags.description:
List of product attribute flags specified in the request

May include any of:

  - `"NEW_ON_VIATOR"` - products that have been added to Viator's catalogue within the past 270 days
  - `"FREE_CANCELLATION"` – products that have a cancellation policy that allows for free cancellation (i.e., excludes products for which `cancellationPolicy.type` is `"ALL_SALES_FINAL"` in the product content response)
  - `"SKIP_THE_LINE"` – products that allow participants to attend a location without having to obtain a separate ticket on the occasion itself (`itinerary.skipTheLine` is `true`)
  - `"PRIVATE_TOUR"` – products where only the travelers who have booked the product will be present (`itinerary.privateTour` is `true`)
  - `"SPECIAL_OFFER"` – products that have a pricing discount available (i.e., `summary.fromPriceBeforeDiscount` will be present in the response from [/availability/schedules/{product-code}](#operation/availabilitySchedules))
  - `"LIKELY_TO_SELL_OUT"` - popular products that routinely sell out (this is equivalent to filtering by tag `20757`).

products.description: List of products matching the filtering criteria, sorted and paginated as specified in the request

totalCount.description: Total number of products matching the filtering criteria – these may be accessed via multiple calls to this service using the pagination feature.

productCodes.description: The unique identifier of the product(s) for which recommendations are being retrieved.

recommendationTypes.description:
Types of recommendation. One of:
- `IS_SIMILAR_TO`: returns products that are deemed similar to the requested product based on machine learning algorithms, considering attributes such as location, category, itinerary, price range and others.

Note: New recommendation types can be added over time, allowing flexibility for different use cases.

productCode.description: The unique identifier of the product for which recommendations are being retrieved.

recommendations.description:
A map of recommended product lists, categorized by different recommendation types. 
The keys being the recommendation type and the values being the list of recommended product codes.

additionalProperties.description:
Possible recommendation types:
  - `IS_SIMILAR_TO`: A ranked list of product codes that are considered most similar to the requested product.

FreetextSearchProductFiltering.description: Criteria by which to filter product search results (i.e., when `searchTypes` includes `"PRODUCTS"`)

destination.description:
Match results that are assigned this destination.
Only Viator destination integer ID is accepted for now.

dateRange.description: Match products that are available to be booked on one or more of the days included in this date range

from.description:
Match results that are available from `from` to `to`.

- **Format**: ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) in time-zone of supplier and cannot be in the past.

to.description:
Match results that are available from `from` to `to`.

- **Format**: ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) in time-zone of supplier
- **Note**:
  - `to` cannot be in the past and is limited to one year from the date on which the request is made.  
  - Multi-day tours that conclude after this date will still appear in the results, so long as the tour commences prior to this date, even if they conclude on a date that is further into the future than `to`. If you wish to exclude such products from the search results, the following options are available:
    1. Exclude all multi-day tours from the search results by filtering out any items that contain `"itineraryType": "MULTI_DAY_TOUR"`
    2. Implement your own logic to calculate whether a product concludes after the `endDate` specified in the request by requesting full product details for the multi-day tour using [/products/{product-code}](#operation/products), determining the duration of the tour in days by the length of the `itinerary.days[]` array, and filtering this product from the search results in the event that (`from` + duration) occurs after `to`.

price.description: Match products which have a 'from price' within the range indicated here

from.description: Match results that with price within `from` to `to`

to.description: Match results that with price within `from` to `to`

rating.description: Match products that have an average rating within the range indicated here

from.description: Match results that with rating within `from` to `to`

to.description: Match results that with rating within `from` to `to`

durationInMinutes.description: Match products that have a duration (length of time the experience lasts) within the range indicated here

from.description: Match results that with duration within `from` to `to`

to.description: Match results that with duration within `from` to `to`

flags.description:
Match products that have the following attributes:

Any of:

  - `"NEW_ON_VIATOR"` – products that have been added to Viator's catalogue within the past 270 days
  - `"SKIP_THE_LINE"` – products that allow participants to attend a location without having to obtain a separate ticket on the occasion itself (`itinerary.skipTheLine` is `true`)
  - `"PRIVATE_TOUR"` – products where only the travelers who have booked the product will be present (`itinerary.privateTour` is `true`)
  - `"LIKELY_TO_SELL_OUT"` - popular products that routinely sell out (this is equivalent to filtering by tag `20757`).

includeAutomaticTranslations.description: Specifies whether proucts with automatically machine-translated content (no human oversight) should be included in the results

FreetextSearchProductSorting.description: Specify the sorting method for product results (i.e., when `searchTypes` includes `"PRODUCTS"`)

sort.description:
The method of sorting product search results. One of:
- `"DEFAULT"`: sorts based on search term to result relevancy in descending order.
  - **Note**: What Viator gets paid impacts this sort order). Custom ordering is not supported; therefore, the `order` field should be omitted when this sort order is chosen.
- `"ITINERARY_DURATION"`: sort by `duration`. Allow custom order.
- `"PRICE"`: sort by `fromPrice`. Allow custom order.
- `"REVIEW_AVG_RATING"`: sort by average review ratings in descending order . Custom order is not allowed.
- `"DATE_ADDED"`: sort according to when the product was added to the viator catalogue. Allow custom order.

order.description:
The direction of sorting search results.
One of: 
- `"ASCENDING"`
- `"DESCENDING"`

searchType.description:
Specifies a domain within which the search should be performed

One of:
- `"ATTRACTIONS"`
- `"DESTINATIONS"`
- `"PRODUCTS"`

searchTerm.description: Return results that contain this free-text search term

searchTypes.description: Specifies the domain(s) in which to search for the `searchTerm` and the respective pagination details for each type of search results

currency.description:
Currency code of price range in request filter and the prices in response.

One of: `"AUD"`, `"BRL"`, `"CAD"`, `"CHF"`, `"DKK"`, `"EUR"`, `"GBP"`, `"HKD"`, `"INR"`, `"JPY"`, `"NOK"`, `"NZD"`, `"SEK"`, `"SGD"`, `"TWD"`, `"USD"`, `"ZAR"`.'

id.description:
**unique numeric identifier** of the destination
 - use this value as the `destination` input field for other Viator API services.

parentDestinationId.description: **unique numeric identifier** of the destination's parent destination

parentDestinationName.description: **natural-language name** of the destination's parent destination

rating.description: This object refers to reviews with this star-rating

count.description: Number of reviews for this product with a star-rating of `rating`

provider.description:
Provider for this set of reviews; one of:
- `"VIATOR"`
- `"TRIPADVISOR"`

reviewCounts.description: Breakdown of number of reviews per rating for reviews sourced from this provider

totalCount.description: Total number of reviews for this product sourced from this provider

ProductReviewsSummary.description:
Summary of reviews and ratings for this attraction

**Note**:
  - Review data is updated daily; i.e., all reviews received on a day will be added and averages re-calculated in a single event.
  - Viator performs checks on reviews - for more information, see [Review authenticity](#section/Key-concepts/Review-authenticity)

sources.description: Breakdown of review summaries for each review source

reviewCountTotals.description: Breakdown of number of reviews per rating for all reviews of this product

totalReviews.description: Total number of reviews available for this product from all sources

combinedAverageRating.description: Combined average rating for this product across all reviews from all sources

id.description: unique numeric identifier of the attraction

name.description:
natural-language title of the attraction

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

primaryDestinationId.description: unique numeric identifier of this attraction's primary destination

description.description:
natural-language descriptive text for this attraction

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter
  - Access to this information is only available if it is enabled for your account. Please [reach out to our support team](#section/Support) if you would like to take advantage of our unique content.
  - You must ensure that your site is configured such that **no Viator Unique Content is indexed by any search engine**. This is a requirement for site certification. For more information, see [Key concepts – Protecting unique content](#section/Key-concepts/Protecting-unique-content)

destinationName.description:
natural-language name of the primary destination associated with this attraction

**Note**: This field contains natural language suitable for display to the user; content will be translated (if necessary) into the language specified in the Accept-Language header parameter

productsCount.description: Number of products associated with this attraction

destinations.description: Destinations that include the `searchTerm` when `"DESTINATIONS"` results are requested via `searchTypes`

totalCount.description: Total number of destinations that may be returned if pagination is not specified in the request.

attractions.description: Attractions that include the `searchTerm` when `"ATTRACTIONS"` results are requested via `searchTypes`

totalCount.description: Total number of attractions that may be returned if pagination is not specified in the request.

products.description: Products that include the `searchTerm` when `"PRODUCTS"` results are requested via `searchTypes`

totalCount.description: Total number of products that may be returned if pagination is not specified in the request.

ageBand.description:
Machine-interpretable value indicating the age-band that this/these
traveler(s) fall into; one of:

  - `"ADULT"`
  - `"SENIOR"`
  - `"YOUTH"`
  - `"CHILD"`
  - `"INFANT"`
  - `"TRAVELER"`

The valid age-band identifiers for the product are provided in the `pricingInfo.ageBands[]` array in the [product content response](#section/Key-concepts/Content-ingestion-endpoints). The `"TRAVELER"` age-band is to be used when the `pricingInfo.type` is `"UNIT"`; i.e., unit or group pricing.

To learn more about how to implement age bands, see the following guide: [Implementing age bands & pax mix](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/merchant/agebands-pax-mix?source=specs)

numberOfTravelers.description: Number of travelers/passengers in this age-band

productCode.description: Retrieve availability details for the product identified by this product code

productOptionCode.description:
Retrieve availability details for the product option (tour grade) identified by this product option code

For more information see: [Key concepts: Product options](#section/Key-concepts/Product-options)

startTime.description:
Retrieve availability details only for items that start at this time. If this parameter is omitted, information about **all** available starting times for the specified date will be included in the response.
- **Example**: `"17:15"`

travelDate.description: Retrieve availability details for items that operate on this date

currency.description:
Display pricing in the currency identified by this 3-letter code
- **Example**: `"USD"`

RecommendedRetailPrice.description: The recommended retail price for the item and the price at which the product is sold on the Viator.com site

PartnerNetPrice.description: The non-booking fee component of the total amount that Viator will invoice the merchant for this item

LineItemPriceObjectSubtotal.description: Subtotal pricing for this line item, including discount information if available

ageBand.description:
Machine-interpretable value indicating the age-band of the travelers that
this line-item describes the subtotal price for; one of:

  - `"TRAVELER"`
  - `"ADULT"`
  - `"CHILD"`
  - `"YOUTH"`
  - `"INFANT"`
  - `"SENIOR"`

  To learn more about how to implement age bands, see the following guide: [Implementing age bands & pax mix](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/merchant/agebands-pax-mix?source=specs)

numberOfTravelers.description: The number of travelers that this line-item describes the subtotal price for

bookingFee.description:
The booking fee component of the total amount that Viator will invoice the merchant for the sale of this item

**Note**: 
- The rate applied is given in the merchant's contract with Viator
- This value will be zero for merchant partners using the commission-based pricing model

commission.description:
The amount the merchant will receive as a commission for the sale of this item 

**Note**: This element is only relevant and will only be returned to merchant partners using the commission-based pricing model

partnerTotalPrice.description:
The total amount that Viator will invoice the merchant for the sale of this item

See the following article to learn more about how pricing works in this API: [Calculating Product Pricing with the Merchant API](https://partnerresources.viator.com/travel-commerce/merchant/pricing?source=specs)

priceBeforeDiscount.description: Non-discounted price if `price` has a discount applied to it

ExtraChargesItemInDestinationCurrency.description: The Extra Charges amount in destination currency.

amountPerUnit.description:
The cost per one Extra Charges in Destination currency.

**Note**:
  - Prices payable to third parties are subject to change due to Exchange rates fluctuations between the request time and the travelDate.

totalAmount.description:
Total amount of all Extra Charges in Destination currency.

**Note**:
  - Prices payable to third parties are subject to change due to Exchange rates fluctuations between the request time and the travelDate.

currency.description: The supplier preferred currency to be paid in Destination.

ExtraChargesItem.description: List of extra charges. Partners can use this to build a breakdown list of costs.

numberOfUnits.description:
How many times the Extra Charges applies.

If the Extra Charges value is to be charged per person this value will match `numberOfTravelers` passed in the request.

If the Extra Charges value is to be charged per unit this value will match the amount of groups/units in the request.

amountPerUnit.description: The amount per unique Extra Charges.

totalAmount.description: Total amount of all Extra Charges for a given item.

ExtraChargesSummary.description:
Information about the Extra Charges applicable to this `bookableItem`.

**Note**:
  - Prices payable to third parties are provided to us by the operator, and may be subject to change.

price.description: Pricing information applicable to this `bookableItem` including extra charges.

recommendedRetailPrice.description:
The recommended retail price value including highest Extra Charges value to be paid in destination by the traveler.
This value will only be returned if the `bookableItem` passed in the request has Extra Charges.

priceBeforeDiscount.description: Pricing information applicable to this `bookableItem` including extra charges if no discount had been applied.

recommendedRetailPrice.description:
Non-discounted price if price has a discount applied to it.
